game.name: Magic Tiny Lands
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Magic Tin Lands is an action-platformer where a small knight travels through a mystical forest to defeat the evil unleashed by a magical monolith.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Magic Tin Lands is an action-platformer where a small knight travels through a mystical forest to defeat the evil unleashed by a magical monolith.
